什么是Chicken Attack？Chicken Attack就是让mc里面的鸡可以进行攻击，攻击条件、攻击伤害等都可以自定义而不是让小鸡再是挨打的动物(这年头打个鸡都要被反打了)

# On which worlds do you not want to use this plugin?
# #禁止某个世界使用此插件
disabled-worlds: []

mobs:
  chicken:

    # How much damage is a chicken supposed to do?
    # 一只鸡的伤害
    attack-damage: 1

    # How often can a chicken damage the player? (in seconds)
    # 一只鸡多久能伤害玩家一次？(以秒为单位)
    attack-speed: 0.5

    # How fast can a chicken move? (1 is regular speed, 0.5 is half speed and 2 is double speed)
    # 一只鸡的速度(1是正常速度，0.5是半速，2是双倍速度)
    speed: 1.5

    # When should a chicken target the player?
    # 鸡什么时候该攻击玩家
    # It is up to you which conditions to use.
    # 这里由你决定使用什么条件
    attack-conditions:

      # At how much health should it target the player? (in percentage)
      # 鸡应该攻击多少血量的玩家?(百分比)
      health-percentage: 100

      # 删除掉'#'即可使用附加条件
      # 附加条件
      # Additional conditions:

      # How close does the player have to be for the chicken to attack the player? (in blocks)
      # 玩家必须离小鸡多近才能让小鸡攻击他?(以方块为单位)
      # distance: 10
      # 距离

    stop-conditions:
      # How far away does the player have to be for the chicken to give up on his revenge? (in blocks)
      # 玩家需要离小鸡多远小鸡才不会攻击玩家？(以方块为单位)
      distance: 20

      #附加条件
      # Additional conditions:

      # At how much health should it give up? (in percentage)
      # 小鸡应该放弃攻击多少血的玩家？(百分比)
      # health-percentage: 50
      # 血量
